Class JsonSkinLoader

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.assets.loaders.AssetLoader<T,P>
com.badlogic.gdx.assets.loaders.AsynchronousAssetLoader<Skin,SkinLoader.SkinParameter>
com.badlogic.gdx.assets.loaders.SkinLoader
com.github.tommyettinger.bridge.JsonSkinLoader
public class JsonSkinLoader extends SkinLoader
An AssetLoader to load a JsonSkin. This enables you to deserialize Structured JSON fonts from a Skin JSON and load it through an AssetManager. Example code: AssetManager assetManager = new AssetManager(); assetManager.setLoader(Skin.class, new JsonSkinLoader(assetManager.getFileHandleResolver())); assetManager.load("skin-name.json", Skin.class);
